FuncDef: The reset ipv6 nd anti-attack record command clears ND message attack records. The reset ipv6 nd anti-attack record command clears ND message attack records. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: reset ipv6 nd anti-attack record { all | { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-num> } }

ParaDef.Info:
Clears all ND message attack records.
-

Clears all ND message attack records on a specified interface.
-

Clears all ND message attack records on a specified interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ipv6 nd anti-attack record all
